name: Infiltration (itch) (Jacob Rogers)
description:
Infiltration is a puzzle game where the player controls an agent currently trying to, well, infiltrate the enemy's secret base in order to collect documents of information. These vital documents are all stored in briefcases, and it's the player's job to grab all of these and get out whilst avoiding any lasers and/or traps. Some lasers are actually a bit faulty, and only turn on when the security system detects a briefcase being picked up, whether it be an actual one or one of the trap briefcases set up within the level. Avoid being detected and grab the briefcases as you ascend out of the enemy base and return safely.

This project was made using PuzzleScript, a free-to-use online game engine made specifically for creating puzzle games.
